summary: This document is an email chain from March 2021 discussing the organization of document batches in the 'USvEpstein Relativity' database. It clarifies that Batch 003 contains data from the USAO-SDFL (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida) and Batch 004 contains 'OPR Materials' (likely Office of Professional Responsibility) with attached STR (Search Term Report) hits, referencing a specific file (EFTA00100267).

persons.name: Mane Villafana
persons.context: Appears in the description of Batch 004 - OPR Materials, which is associated with a date range from 2020-08-26 to 2020-09-09.

events.title: Email clarification on Epstein Relativity batches
events.description: Email exchange clarifying the contents of two batches (003 and 004) in the USvEpstein Relativity database, confirming Batch 003 contains USAO-SDFL data and Batch 004 contains OPR Materials with STR hits.

events.title: USAO-SDFL data collection
events.description: Reference to data from the USAO-SDFL (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida) dated 2020-10-15, included in Batch 003.

events.title: OPR Materials timeframe start
events.description: Start date referenced for OPR Materials included in Batch 004.

events.title: OPR Materials timeframe end
events.description: End date referenced for OPR Materials included in Batch 004.

keyFacts: The email discusses the 'USvEpstein Relativity' database, indicating an organized document management system for the case.
Batch 003 is identified as containing data from 'USAO-SDFL Files all 2020-10.15', referencing the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida.
Batch 004 is identified as 'OPR Materials' (likely Office of Professional Responsibility) associated with 'Mane Villafana' and covering a date range from 2020-08-26 to 2020-09-09.
The correspondence confirms the attachment of 'STR Hits' (Search Term Report hits) to Batch 004, with a specific reference to file EFTA00100267.
